description: $RAINBOW is a hyper-deflationary, ethical DeFi token sitting on the Binance Smart Chain which combines 7 features into a single cryptoasset. It is a project launched on the 18th August 2021 and is developed and maintained by a team situated in the UK. It aims to develop a decentralized token launchpad service "Bifrost" that specializes in user friendliness, flexibility and low fees.
